Privacy Policy

Introduction

This Privacy Policy applies to the "Children's Alphabet - SPEAK from A to Z" (hereinafter referred to as the "Application") for mobile devices developed by Imedidze Anzor (hereinafter referred to as the "Service Provider"). This is a commercial service provided "AS IS".

Information Collection and Use

The "Children's Alphabet - SPEAK from A to Z" Application does not collect or store any personal information of users. The only request the application makes is access to your device's microphone for speech recognition. This feature is necessary for children to pronounce words and proceed with learning.

Permissions

  • Microphone: The application requires access to the microphone for speech recognition. Microphone access is used solely within the application's operation and is not shared with third parties.
  • Internet: For the proper functioning of speech recognition and comparison of spoken words, the application requires an internet connection. This is necessary to send audio recordings to the server for processing and to receive recognition results.

Application Operation

Offline Mode

The application can operate in a partially offline mode; however, for full functionality, especially for speech recognition and word comparison, an internet connection is required. Without an internet connection, speech recognition and word comparison features may be unavailable.

Audio Recording

When using the speech recognition feature, the application records your voice to compare it with predefined words. These audio recordings are processed on the Service Provider's servers and are not stored after the recognition process is completed.

Third Parties

The application does not use third-party services for collecting or processing user data, except for the necessary services for speech recognition. No data is shared with third parties, except as provided in this Privacy Policy.

Security

The Service Provider implements all reasonable measures to ensure the security of your device and to prevent unauthorized access to the application's features. All data transmitted over the internet is protected using modern encryption methods.

Changes to the Privacy Policy

The Service Provider reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. All changes will be published on this page. It is recommended to regularly review the Privacy Policy to stay informed about any changes.

Consent

By using the Application, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

Contact Information
